scripts.merge-main-with-ghpages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit
scripts.add-dist-and-commit: git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit'
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && npm run merge-main-with-ghpages && npm run add-dist-and-commit
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
